summary: EngineContext encapsulates all runtime information and control objects needed during the execution of a flow run, exposing the flow instance, run metadata, task runner, task futures, state tracking, result mapping, synchronization portal, and timeout handling.
business_intent: Provide a centralized, mutable context that enables the flow engine to coordinate task execution, monitor and record task and flow states, manage asynchronous synchronization, and enforce flow-level timeouts within a single run.
